data.eml:eml: A new species of Brachypogon (Isohelea) from arid zones of Argentina (Diptera: Ceratopogonidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Spinelli, Gustavo R., Cazorla, Carla G. (2004): A new species of Brachypogon (Isohelea) from arid zones of Argentina (Diptera: Ceratopogonidae). Zootaxa 570: 1-6, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.157312
